title: Newcastle Coders Group - 10 Tips to Becoming an Azure Architect
thumbnailDescription: Newcastle Coders Group - 10 Tips to Becoming an Azure Architect
eventShortDescription:
​Newcastle Coders Group at the SSW Newcastle office

10 Tips to becoming an Azure Architect with Adam Cogan:

Learn what you need to know to become a NASA rocket scientist…. Sorry Azure Architect. It is easy to sign into the Azure portal, click around and create a bunch of services. That's not good, it's called ClickOps.

A good developer needs solid best practices to build enterprise software. Learn how to be more cost efficient, more scalable utilizing strong Azure skills. Adam Cogan will walk you through the 10 things you need to know to start singing with Azure... enjoy your journey from Kitty Hawk to Mars.

Agenda:
6:00 Tech News
6:20 Adam's talk
7:20 Pizza
7:40 The rest of Adam's talk

Getting there:
Public Transport: The closest public transport is the civic tram stop.
Parking: There is some on-street parking available in Civic Lane and a car park at the Wright Lane car park.
